name: is-standard
description: Tests whether standard-or-contract-principal matches the current network type, and therefore represents a principal that can spend tokens on the current network type. That is, the network is either of type mainnet, or testnet. Only SPxxxx and SMxxxx c32check form addresses can spend tokens on a mainnet, whereas only STxxxx and SNxxxx c32check forms addresses can spend tokens on a testnet. All addresses can receive tokens, but only principal c32check form addresses that match the network type can spend tokens on the network. This method will return true if and only if the principal matches the network type, and false otherwise.
Note: This function is only available starting with Stacks 2.1.
examples: true on testnet and false on mainnet
true on testnet and false on mainnet
true on mainnet and false on testnet
true on mainnet and false on testnet
false on both mainnet and testnet
